head.citation-title: Contrast maintaining graying method based on quaternion chromaticity distance基于四元数色度距离的对比度保持灰度化方法
head.abstracts: © 2021, Editorial Department of Journal of Nanjing University of Science and Technology. All right reserved.The traditional contrast maintaining graying method uses the Euclidean distance to calculate the contrast of color images. This method only considers the overall correlation of channels, and does not consider the correlation between channels, which may lead to noise or loss of details in the grayscale results. To solve this problem, a quaternion chromaticity distance measurement formula based on chromaticity plane projection is proposed by using quaternion correlation theory. A global chromaticity contrast measurement method based on random difference is proposed by using the formula and a local chromaticity contrast measurement method based on horizontal and vertical difference is proposed. The contrast maintaining objective function is constructed by using the contrast measurement method, and the optimal combination coefficients for grayscale mapping are determined by using the ideal of discrete approximate solution. The experimental results show that the method has good real-time performance and the obtained grayscale results can better maintain the contrast information of color details in the original color image.

coredata.dc:description: The traditional contrast maintaining graying method uses the Euclidean distance to calculate the contrast of color images. This method only considers the overall correlation of channels, and does not consider the correlation between channels, which may lead to noise or loss of details in the grayscale results. To solve this problem, a quaternion chromaticity distance measurement formula based on chromaticity plane projection is proposed by using quaternion correlation theory. A global chromaticity contrast measurement method based on random difference is proposed by using the formula and a local chromaticity contrast measurement method based on horizontal and vertical difference is proposed. The contrast maintaining objective function is constructed by using the contrast measurement method, and the optimal combination coefficients for grayscale mapping are determined by using the ideal of discrete approximate solution. The experimental results show that the method has good real-time performance and the obtained grayscale results can better maintain the contrast information of color details in the original color image.
